Title: Limiting the shift between classes of taxable property in the town of Haverstraw, county of Rockland
Summary: Relates to limiting the shift between classes of taxable property in the town of Haverstraw, county of Rockland for 2026-2027.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to limiting the shift between classes of taxable property in the town of Haverstraw, county of Rockland
